Review: Monarch is solid with a few rough edges. Its worst feature is that it uses "dark patterns" to artificially boost its review scores here on the Play store. It asks users if they like the app, then asks them to rate the app on the Play store only if they say yes. Therefore, you can't trust the rating to be accurate. Monarch is shaping up to be a decent replacement for Mint, and I'm rooting for the Monarch team to succeed in delivering a quality product without anti-user policies.

Review: Monarch is solid with a few rough edges. Its worst feature is that it uses "dark patterns" to artificially boost its review scores here on the Play store. It asks users if they like the app, then asks them to rate the app on the Play store only if they say yes. Therefore, you can't trust the rating to be accurate. Monarch is shaping up to be a decent replacement for Mint, and I'm rooting for the Monarch team to succeed in delivering a quality product without anti-user policies.
